item.title: 85 Million Newly Stolen Passwords Being Used In Ongoing Attacks
item.description: As 85 million newly compromised passwords are confirmed, researchers warn they are being used in attacks against enterprise networks.

item.title: Fitbit Owners Get A Next-Generation Sleep Feature
item.description: Fitbit has launched a new feature that suggests when you should go to bed each night, based on your logged sleep and how you feel throughout the day.

item.title: Balancing Social Commerce & Personalization Without Overusing AI
item.description: Social commerce is surging, with platforms like TikTok Shop and Instagram Checkout redefining how consumers discover and purchase products.
